Serial conman Brian Hunter stole $333k in legal aid from Chris Tennet’s legal firm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serial-conman-brian-hunter-stole-stole-333k-in-legal-aid-from-chris-from-chris-tennets-tennets-legal-firm/6kztajwxrnh7jijetk3auh7fnm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serial-conman-brian-hunter-stole-stole-333k-in-legal-aid-from-chris-from-chris-tennets-tennets-legal-firm/6kztajwxrnh7jijetk3auh7fnm/ Jeremy WilkinsonLawyer Chris Tennet gave a conman a chance, but Brian Hunter hadn't really changed. Tue, 11 Mar 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Chris Tennet hired serial conman Brian Hunter (insert) to work at his law firm. Tennet is now before the Lawyers and Conveyancers Disciplinary Tribunal to explain what, if any, supervision he had over Hunter, knowing full well his background. Photo / NZME
